A Mobile VR Experience
Thin Line

What is Thin Line?

Thin Line is a virtual reality program that immerses users in a woman’s personal experience.

Drawing on the power of storytelling, it reveals the internal thoughts and external forces that shape her journey through the healthcare system. It is for a range of audiences, especially care providers and medical trainees who form the front lines of women’s healthcare.
